snippet.title: The Expanse: A Telltale Series Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
See what the press are saying about The Expanse: A Telltale Series!

Episode One is available NOW on PlayStation, Xbox and PC via Epic Game Store, with new episodes dropping every two weeks!

In the near future on the outskirts of the asteroid belt, a bloody mutiny breaks loose on the Artemis. You take the role of XO Camina Drummer, where your choices determine the fate of the ship.

What will you do with the truth, Bosmang?

#TelltaleIsBack

Epic Game Store
Standard Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=AccoladesTrailer&sub_id=telltale 
Deluxe Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series--deluxe-edition?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=AccoladesTrailer&sub_id=telltale

Xbox
Deluxe Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwg1nj92q94?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=AccoladesTrailer
Standard Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nfxwr3nbq9s?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=AccoladesTrailer

PlayStation:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004308/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=AccoladesTrailer
